documents.content: Satya Nadella was born in Hyderabad of present-day Telangana, India into a Telugu-speaking Hindu family. His mother Prabhavati was a Sanskrit lecturer and his father, Bukkapuram Nadella Yugandhar, was an [TAG]Indian Administrative Service[TAG] officer of the 1962 batch.

202.description: A successful call results with an Operation-Location header used to check the status of the gna generation job.
